Author: TotallyNotARadar
Text: > he didn’t think anyone cared for dinner and they said they liked it to be nice.   bitch tf, what is wrong with him? Yes there’s gently saying that “hey hun, I wasn’t a huge fan but thanks for making it!”and there’s this.   It’s terrible he acted that way, but it’s also no reason to give up trying. Remember, this is for you not your husband
